patchlogs.name: Update 15.7.2 + 15.7.2.1
patchlogs.fixes:
CENTAUR:   Part sword, part shield, the Centaur excels at charging headlong into enemy fire.
Start your Research for the Itzal and Fluctus in the Clan Dojo, and purchase the blueprint for the Centaur from the Marketplace today!

name: Knux
description: Gallium-alloy gauntlets for close-range Archwing combat. Designed by the infamous Tyl Regor.

components.name: Blueprint
components.description: Gallium-alloy gauntlets for close-range Archwing combat. Designed by the infamous Tyl Regor.

components.name: Detonite Injector
components.description: Detonite injectors are the basis for explosive and incendiary weapons.Can be acquired from Grineer Offensives & Clan Research.

components.name: Forma
components.description: This shape-altering component is fundamental to Orokin construction. Allows you to change the polarity of a mod slot on a Warframe, Companions or Weapon and then resets their affinity to Unranked. This can only be used on Level 30 Warframes, Companions and Weapons.

components.name: Furax
components.description: These power gauntlets lack the range of most Melee Weapons, but Furax is far more devastating when you strike an enemy in close combat.

components.name: Gallium
components.description: Soft metal used in microelectronics and energy weapons.Locations: Mars and Uranus.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.2.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed missing audio on certain Knux attacks.

name: Prisma Veritux
